    • Method Detail

      • buyInvestment

        public void buyInvestment​(java.lang.String symbol,
                          double price,
                          int amount)
        Runs the buy command to buy a investment that already exsists at the correction location, with the correct parameters.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol of the investment.
        price - the price to buy the investment at.
        amount - the amount of the investment to buy.

      • buyInvestment

        public void buyInvestment​(boolean isStock,
                          java.lang.String symbol,
                          java.lang.String price,
                          java.lang.String amount,
                          java.lang.String name)
                   throws CustomException
        Runs the buy command to buy a new investment with the correct parameters.
        Parameters:
        isStock - to know if the investment is a stock or not.
        symbol - the symbol of the stock.
        price - the initial price of the stock.
        amount - the initial amount of the stock to buy.
        name - the name of the stock.
        Throws:
        CustomException - throws a custom exception if a parameter doesn't fit

      • sellInvestment

        public double sellInvestment​(java.lang.String symbol,
                             java.lang.String price,
                             java.lang.String amount)
                      throws CustomException
        Sells an amount of symbol investment at price, price.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol of the investment.
        price - the price to sell at.
        amount - the amount to sell.
        Throws:
        CustomException - throws a custom exception if a parameter doesn't fit

      • addInvestment

        public void addInvestment​(java.lang.String type,
                          java.lang.String symbol,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          double price,
                          int quantity,
                          double bookValue)
        Given the 6 parameters of a investment, create a new investment of type type, and add it to the array list.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of investment
        symbol - the symbol of the inevstment
        name - the name of the investment
        price - the current price of the investment
        quantity - the current quantity of the investment
        bookValue - the current bookvalue of the investment

      • findInvestments

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findInvestments​(java.lang.String keywords,
                                                              java.lang.String symbol,
                                                              double price1,
                                                              double price2)
        Given a string of keywrods, a symbol, and/or price range, find all investments that meet all criteria.
        Parameters:
        keywords - the keywords to look for.
        symbol - the symbol of the investment.
        price1 - the min price in the range.
        price2 - the max price in the range.

      • updatePrice

        public void updatePrice​(int index,
                        double price)
        will update the price of an investment at index with price price.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the investment to update
        price - the price to update it to

      • hasInvestment

        public boolean hasInvestment​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Is used to check if the portfolio has a certain investment based on given symbol
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol to looks for.
        Returns:
        Will return true if there is a stock in the portoflio with the symbol given. Will return false otherwise.

      • investementLocation

        private int investementLocation​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Given a symbol, will return the location of the investment as an integer.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol to look for.
        Returns:
        Will return the integer location of the investment symbol. If not found will return -1.

        keywords - the keywords to add the investment to

      • removeFromHashMap

        private void removeFromHashMap​(java.lang.Integer index)
        Will remove and index from the hashmap, and update all indexes greater then the index in order to account for the indexes shift by 1 when we remove and investment.
        Parameters:
        index - and Integer index

        Gets a list of investments that matches some keywords.
        Parameters:
        keywords - the keywords to look for.
        Returns:
        Will return and ArrayList of Integers that are indexes that match all keywords.
